message: I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
I appreciate the offer, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $80 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I've got to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $110
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $110 is still higher than what I'm comfortable paying. Let's try $90. This is a fair price that gives you a profit while staying within my budget.
I can see you're really interested in the product, but I've got to make a profit. I'll meet you at $95, but that's as low as I'm willing to go
I'm really trying to stay within my budget, and $95 is still a little high.  I'm willing to go to $92.  I hope we can close the deal.
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we won't be able to reach an agreement. I'll give you one more chance to meet me in the middle. I'll sell it to you for $98
